about_the_game:
Go on an exciting journey through space in this lovingly designed indie rogue-lite space shooter. Gather resources, craft new equipment and level up your pilot to set against the hordes of alien enemies. Party up with companions that will make your journey less lonely and help you on your path.



Star Dust - A Journey Through Space

Features:
  • nostalgic sidescroller with an unprecedented genre mix with elements of rpgs, shoot 'em ups and rogue-lites
  • different skill trees to spend your hard-earned star dust on and specialize your pilot
  • blueprints and resources to craft new equipment for your ship
  • randomly generated enemy waves to make every run through a level feel special
  • numerous planets with unique settings and individual challenges to meet
  • loveable companions to help you on your journey through space and entertain you
  • adaptive music that always suits the stage of the current level

- Oh great, so you just fly around and kill anything that looks 'alien' to you? That's the spirit.
- Well, that's how it worked by now.

name: Star Dust - A Journey Through Space Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710 or Radeon HD 6450 (or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

Gather ressources, craft new equipment and level up your pilot to set against the hordes of alien enemies. Party up with companions that will make your journey less lonely and help you on your path.
